thread.title: BRIEF-Maruti Suzuki India Exec Says Committed To Help Set Up Ecosystem Needed For Electric Vehicles‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Maruti Suzuki India Exec Says Committed To Help Set Up Ecosystem Needed For Electric Vehicles‍​
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Maruti Suzuki India MD & CEO Kenichi Ayukawa:
* MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA EXEC SAYS COMMITTED TO HELP SET UP THE ECOSYSTEM NEEDED FOR ELECTRIC VEHICLES‍​
* MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA EXEC SAYS EXPLORING VARIOUS OPTIONS TO SUPPORT SETTING UP OF CHARGING INFRASTRUCTURE
* MARUTI SUZUKI INDIA EXEC SAYS “HYBRID HAS SIGNIFICANT POTENTIAL IN INDIA, WILL EXIST ALONG SIDE INDIA‘S ELECTRIC VISION” Further company coverage:
